attributes.action: make all mps take a pay cut
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: mps earn £57,485 + expenses , why is this so high when the average wage is so low if they could all take a pay cut by around a third there would be enough to pay for a nurse's annual salery each.whats the deal tony?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
